channel.description: Recent content in PDF on Ozzie.eu

item.title: Generating PDF in .NET Core using Libreoffice
item.description: Looking for Nuget extensions to generate PDF output, there’s a lot of offer, but you have to either convert from another format like HTML or hard-code each page, text block, and layout. Also, most extensions come in freemium versions. An interesting option is used by the team at Smart In Media GmbH & Co. KG. To use their words: I was surprised, just how difficult that endeavor is if you don’t want to pay huge amounts of money to commercial libraries.
